## Erc20SignatureMintable class

Enables generating ERC20 Tokens with rules and an associated signature, which can then be minted by anyone securely

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Erc20SignatureMintable 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [generate(mintRequest)](./sdk.erc20signaturemintable.generate.md) |  | Generate a signature that can be used to mint a certain amount of tokens |
|  [generateBatch(payloadsToSign)](./sdk.erc20signaturemintable.generatebatch.md) |  | Generate a batch of signatures that can be used to mint many token signatures. |
|  [mint(signedPayload)](./sdk.erc20signaturemintable.mint.md) |  | Mint tokens from a signature |
|  [mintBatch(signedPayloads)](./sdk.erc20signaturemintable.mintbatch.md) |  | Mint any number of generated tokens signatures at once |
|  [verify(signedPayload)](./sdk.erc20signaturemintable.verify.md) |  | Verify that a payload is correctly signed |
